items.sentence: I looked around me to see if anyone was paying any attention to me.
I don\'t want to do what I\'m planning to do, but I have no choice.
Tom and I are just getting ready to eat. Would you like to join us?
Tom and I left right away, but Mary stayed behind to wait for John.
I refuse to believe that we can\'t do anything about the situation.
I still don\'t have enough money to buy the motorcycle that I want.
Stop twisting my words. You know very well that\'s not what I said.
The police didn\'t think it was likely that Tom had killed himself.
When you\'ve finished reading that book, please give it back to me.
Switzerland is situated between France, Italy, Austria and Germany.
There were many injured people, but hardly any people were missing.
Tom got on the elevator and pressed the button for the third floor.
Tom has been working for the same website design company for years.
Tom got worried when he learned about the medicine\'s side effects.
Tom had been Mary\'s best friend for as long as she could remember.
Mary can\'t stand Tom\'s boss, because he\'s a male chauvinist pig.
I\'m on a budget, so I don\'t eat out more than three times a week.
People have eaten with their fingers from the beginning of history.
She told me once and for all that she did not want to see me again.
She was unable to completely give up her dream of traveling abroad.
I didn\'t tell Tom about it because I didn\'t want to ruin his day.
Tom could tell by Mary\'s accent that she wasn\'t a native speaker.
Tom doesn\'t know if Mary will go to the mountains or to the beach.
I\'m pretty sure that Tom doesn\'t know what you\'re talking about.
Tom doesn\'t have a cat. However, Tom does have a dog, doesn\'t he?
I have better things to do than sit around all day waiting for Tom.
I have many visas in my passport because I travel a lot for my job.
I met someone the other day that I think I could fall in love with.
I spent three weeks in this hospital when I was thirteen years old.
I don\'t feel like going to the movies. Let\'s take a walk instead.
Most car accidents happen because drivers aren\'t paying attention.
The boy who\'s swimming over there with Mary is my younger brother.
If you put more tea leaves into the pot, the tea will taste better.
It took me more than two hours to translate a few pages of English.
I never for a moment imagined that my blog would become so popular.
I tried to reach you on the phone, but I was unable to get through.
Tom drank a lot at the party and ended up making a fool of himself.
Tom dropped out of school and started working when he was thirteen.
Tom grabbed the half-eaten burrito from Mary and started eating it.
Tom had a big bruise on his forehead after he walked into the door.
Tom had no sooner walked in the door than Mary started to complain.
Having done my homework, I watched the baseball game on television.
Are you seriously thinking about buying a computer from that store?
Tom said he saw something weird on the other side of that mountain.
Tom said he thought Mary might have to stay in Boston until Monday.
Tom shared the food that his mother had given him with his friends.
Tom suggested that they convert the old church into a concert hall.
Tom was dissatisfied with the service at the hotel where he stayed.
Tom was just about to say something when Mary walked into the room.
Tom was teased because he looked different from the other children.
